name: Breaching humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: classic tour saw two humpback whales breaching and tail-slapping near the islands outside Reykjavík.

name: Island humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: pair of humpbacks lingering by the islands just outside Reykjavík harbour.

name: Rolling humpback near islands
info: Elding whale diary: third humpback whale rolling and slapping its pectoral fins near the same island group later in the tour.

name: Shallow-feeding humpbacks
info: Elding whale diary: two humpback whales moving side by side in shallow water with harbour porpoises nearby.

name: Lundey humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: two familiar humpbacks travelling together near Lundey island in calm winter sun.

name: Deep-diving humpback
info: Elding whale diary: a third humpback whale in the area doing long dives away from the original pair.

name: Humpback Banana
info: Elding whale diary: known humpback Banana seen surfacing with a companion, with white-beaked dolphins bow-riding nearby.

name: Banana's companion
info: Elding whale diary: Banana's travelling companion staying close alongside, occasionally fluking in golden-hour light.

name: Sunset humpback pair
info: Elding whale diary: two humpbacks, including Banana, repeatedly showing tails near a buoy before sunset.

name: Resident humpback duo
info: Elding whale diary: two resident humpback whales travelling close to land in strong winter winds just outside Reykjavík.

name: Race Rocks humpbacks AM
info: Eagle Wing Tours daily sightings: morning tour with several humpback whales feeding in strong currents off Race Rocks, with sea lions nearby.
area: Race Rocks, Juan de Fuca Strait, BC, Canada

name: Race Rocks humpbacks PM
info: Eagle Wing Tours daily sightings: afternoon tour encountered multiple humpback whales circling bait balls near Race Rocks lighthouse.
area: Race Rocks, Juan de Fuca Strait, BC, Canada

name: Long Beach humpbacks 12pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: midday Long Beach cruise recorded around sixteen humpback whales with thousands of common dolphins.

name: Long Beach humpbacks 3pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: afternoon Long Beach trip saw two humpback whales mixed in with large pods of dolphins.

name: December 3 humpback group
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: Long Beach tours documented about five humpback whales among hundreds of common dolphins.

name: Long Beach humpbacks 12pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: noon cruise with eight humpback whales working bait balls near the 150–300 ft line.

name: Long Beach humpbacks 3pm
info: Harbor Breeze whale sightings report: afternoon Long Beach trip recorded eleven humpback whales spread out along the edge of the shipping lane.

name: Edmonds humpback pair
info: Orca Network recent sightings: ferry SPOKANE slowed for two humpback whales just off the Edmonds ferry terminal in Puget Sound.
area: Off Edmonds, Puget Sound, Washington, USA

name: Port Susan Bigg's orcas
info: Orca Network recent sightings: Bigg's killer whales moving slowly southbound through Port Susan between Hat Island and Camano.

name: Hood Canal orca group
info: Orca Network recent sightings: at least four orcas observed north of Bangor on the west side of Hood Canal, milling and splashing in one area.
